locations.name: Matt's Bedroom
locations.description: A modest one-bedroom apartment bedroom with modern, minimalist furniture. Clean and organized. Suburban American style.
key_features: Queen-size bed with wooden frame and simple headboard
Navy blue comforter and white sheets
Wooden nightstand with lamp, phone, alarm clock

lighting_conditions.early_morning: Dim blue pre-dawn light through blinds
lighting_conditions.morning: Bright warm sunlight streaming through open blinds

variations: Full room view from foot of bed
Side view showing window and dresser

locations.prompt_template: anime style modern bedroom, masterpiece, best quality, queen bed with navy blue comforter, wooden nightstand with lamp, white horizontal blinds on window, light gray walls, beige carpet, white dresser with mirror, mirrored sliding closet, clean organized space, detailed background, {lighting}, vibrant colors, high quality
locations.negative_prompt: messy, cluttered, photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, people, dark, poor lighting

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Adjust based on how closely generated images should match reference. Higher = more similar to reference.

locations.name: Matt's Bathroom
locations.description: A small but clean modern bathroom with white tiles and chrome fixtures. Typical American apartment bathroom.
key_features: White porcelain sink with chrome faucet
Three round frosted vanity lights above mirror
Glass-enclosed shower stall with rainfall showerhead
Chrome towel bars with beige towels

lighting_conditions.steamy: Bright lighting with steam from shower
lighting_conditions.dim: Natural light from small window (rarely used)

variations: View focusing on sink and mirror area

locations.prompt_template: anime style modern bathroom, masterpiece, best quality, white porcelain sink with chrome faucet, large mirror with three round frosted vanity lights, white subway tile walls, white tile floor, glass shower enclosure with rainfall showerhead, chrome fixtures, beige towels, clean organized counter with toiletries, detailed background, {lighting}, vibrant colors, high quality
locations.negative_prompt: messy, dirty, cluttered, photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, people, old, outdated

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Bathroom should be consistent but small variations in exact layout are acceptable.

locations.name: Matt's Kitchen
locations.description: A modest galley-style kitchen with modern appliances. Clean, functional, typical American apartment kitchen.
key_features: Stainless steel sink with chrome faucet
Breakfast bar with two stools (visible from living room)
Minimal decor - fruit bowl, knife block

lighting_conditions.morning: Bright natural sunlight from adjacent living room windows
lighting_conditions.bright: Overhead LED lighting plus natural light

variations: Full kitchen view from living room
View focusing on counter with appliances

locations.prompt_template: anime style modern galley kitchen, masterpiece, best quality, white cabinets, gray countertops, stainless steel refrigerator, black coffee maker, chrome toaster, stainless steel sink with chrome faucet, microwave above stove, small window, breakfast bar with stools, clean organized space, detailed background, {lighting}, vibrant colors, high quality
locations.negative_prompt: messy, cluttered, dirty dishes, photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, people, old appliances, outdated

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Kitchen layout should be consistent but exact appliance positions can vary slightly.

generation_settings.model: Animagine XL 3.1 (or equivalent anime SDXL model)
generation_settings.notes: Generate 3 variations per location with different camera angles. Save best 3 as references.

usage_instructions.step_1: Generate location reference images using prompt_template for each location
usage_instructions.step_2: Review and select best 3 images per location
usage_instructions.step_3: Save to matt_wm_25_yo/assets/location_refs/ with naming convention: {location_id}_{number}.png
usage_instructions.step_4: Use these references with IP-Adapter during scene generation
usage_instructions.step_5: IP-Adapter will maintain location consistency across all scenes in that location

notes.approach: AI-generated location references instead of Blender 3D
notes.rationale: Saves 20-40 hours of 3D modeling time while achieving similar consistency
notes.flexibility: Can regenerate references if not satisfied, much faster than Blender iteration
notes.scalability: Same approach works for all 19 locations in full project
